definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The main nutritional components of Xingtai chestnut was analyzed with chemical analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 採用化學分析法，分析了邢臺板栗的主要營養成分。

sentences.english: The aromatic hydrocarbons content in naphtha was analyzed by a chemical reaction method.
sentences.chinese: 用化學分析方法測定了工業用石腦油中芳香烴的含量。

sentences.english: Half-life of radioactive element carbon-14 is 5730 year.
sentences.chinese: 用放射性同位素碳14測定有機物年齡的化學分析。

sentences.english: The hydrochemistry verified the leakage recharge was assured.
sentences.chinese: 水化學分析證實了越流補給的存在。

sentences.english: Fume hood should be provided in each regular chemical analysis laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 每個常規化學分析室都要有通風櫥。

sentences.english: Improved methods for both in situ hybridization and in situ enzyme histochemistry were described.
sentences.chinese: 改良了組織原位雜交和原位酶組織化學分析的方法。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the sensitometry and chemical analysis routine work in motion picture film processing.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要敘述以下二個題目，即感光測定和化學分析。

sentences.english: We know the compositon of the mineral by the chemical analysis.
sentences.chinese: 經過化學分析，我們知道了礦石的構成。

sentences.english: We know the constitution of mineral through chemical analysis.
sentences.chinese: 經過化學分析，我們知道了礦石的構成。

sentences.english: In some cases, the only way to detect a counterfeit drug is through chemical analysis.
sentences.chinese: 在一些案例中，探測假藥的唯一方法是通過化學分析。

sentences.english: The detection tests and chemical analysis methods for mycotoxins were discussed here.
sentences.chinese: 討論了真菌毒素的檢測和化學分析方法。

sentences.english: After chemical assay, we have known the composition of the ore.
sentences.chinese: 經過化學分析，我們知道了礦石的構成。

sentences.english: The principle and method of chemical analysis have been briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了題示化學分析法的原理和方法。

sentences.english: Trituration process would be taken of the material when chemical analysis is underway.
sentences.chinese: 這種材料在進行化學分析時將被磨成粉。
